title: The non-residential units of all concerned eligible slum dwellers shall be earmarked along with their respective allotted unit numbers in the building plan at the time of obtaining the commencement certificate only
clause_text: The non-residential units of all concerned eligible slum dwellers shall be earmarked along with their respective allotted unit numbers in the building plan at the time of obtaining the commencement certificate only.
section: ALLOTMENT OF THE TENEMENTS TO THE PROTECTED OCCUPIERS
